author: timbeiko
content:
Given that we'll be deprecating the terms "eth1" and "eth2" at the Merge, I've put togehter a Great Renaming proposal for Discord channels and Github repository names (note: not the content of each repo - that's up to the repo owners): https://notes.ethereum.org/@timbeiko/great-renaming

To not spam this channel with discussion, I suggest we use a thread for any comments cc: <@!425279588009246720> <@!301186049323958275>

author: pipermerriam
content: This server is strictly for discussions pertaining to the development of the protocol.  This server isn't the appropriate place for support style questions.
